      • Keyword

      • Keyword

        public Keyword(java.lang.String word,
       long f1,
       long f2,
       long n1,
       long n2)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        word - the key word.
        f1 - the frequency of the keyword in the corpus.
        f2 - the frequency of the keyword in the reference corpus.
        n1 - the size of the corpus.
        n2 - the size of the reference corpus.
